faq.question: What is Xentro?
faq.answer: Xentro offers robust staking, bridging, and trading opportunities within the web3 ecosystem, catering to those seeking innovative financial products in cryptocurrency. We aim to provide a platform that supports secure low & high yield activities and enhances accessibility to decentralized financial services.

faq.question: What are the benefits for the early adopters of Xentro?
faq.answer: Early adopters of Xentro will enjoy the advantages of accessing offerings ahead of others, positioning themselves as ambassadors of the project. By being an early supporter, you also play a crucial role in shaping the project's advancement and adoption while gaining insights into its growth and development.

faq.question: How can I become an early adopter?
faq.answer: To become an early adopter you need to do the following:--start-- --newline-- Connect your wallet--newline-- Complete the Xentro Warrior Exclusive tasks--newline-- Mint your Xentro Community & Warrior badges--newline-- Complete featured tasks to gain points in the upcoming airdrop

faq.question: What are the Xentro Community & Warrior badges?
faq.answer: It qualifies holders for our upcoming airdrop and exclusive benefits, while also filtering out airdrop hunters, farmers, and sybils to maintain exclusivity for our core community.

faq.question: Why are the badges capped at only 100,000 each?
faq.answer: We have set this limit to ensure the campaign runs efficiently and concludes promptly, without indefinite extension.

faq.question: What happens when all badges are minted?
faq.answer: Once all badges are minted, the next phase of airdrop and product launch is immediately activated.

faq.question: What happens if I complete the tasks but don't mint the Xentro badges?
faq.answer: To qualify for the airdrop, minting the Xentro badges is a crucial step. Without minting the badges, completing the tasks alone won’t secure your eligibility for the airdrop.

faq.question: What happens if I mint only one of the two Xentro badges?
faq.answer: Minting both Xentro badges is required to qualify for the airdrop. Minting just one badge will not meet the eligibility criteria for receiving the airdrop.

faq.question: When does the airdrop start and end?
faq.answer: The countdown to the airdrop has officially begun. Please refer to our website or official announcements for specific start and end dates.

faq.question: What blockchain network can I mint the Xentro badges?
faq.answer: To mint your Xentro badges, you must have ETH on the Base network to cover blockchain transaction costs.

faq.question: Do I need to pay anything to participate in the airdrop?
faq.answer: No, participation in the airdrop is free. You only need to pay the Base blockchain network fee to mint your Xentro Warrior badge. Be cautious of any sites or individuals asking for payment, as they may be fraudulent.

faq.question: What wallet can I use?
faq.answer: We recommend using a secure & verified non-custodial wallet compatible with the Base network. Some trusted examples are MetaMask, Trustwallet, TokenPocket.

faq.question: Do I need a referral to mint my Xentro badges?
faq.answer: No, you don’t need a referral to mint your Xentro badges.

faq.question: Why can’t I find my referral link?
faq.answer: To get a referral link you must complete the Xentro Warrior Exclusive tasks and mint the Xentro Community & Warrior badges.

faq.question: Why can’t I access more tasks?
faq.answer: To unlock additional tasks, you must first complete the Xentro Exclusive Tasks. This will help you earn more points and boost your Xentro airdrop allocation.

faq.question: What are XENTRO points?
faq.answer: This determines your allocation in our upcoming airdrop. We advise to perform all tasks to get the maximum amount of points.

faq.question: How do I claim my airdrop tokens?
faq.answer: After the completion of the airdrop qualification phase, a snapshot will be taken and instructions on how to claim your tokens will be published. Typically, this will involve connecting your eligible wallet address through our platform to claim your tokens.

faq.question: What about the whitepaper and roadmap?
faq.answer: The whitepaper and roadmap will be released concurrently with our product launch, outlining comprehensive details and strategic direction for our offerings.

faq.question: Where can I find more information about Xentro and the airdrop?
faq.answer: For the latest information, visit our official website, follow our social media channels, and check our announcements. We provide regular updates and details through these platforms.

faq.question: Why can’t I find my referral link?
faq.answer: I referred someone but I did not get any referral points? Referral points are only awarded when the person you referred successfully completes the Xentro Exclusive tasks. Ensure they meet all the criteria for the referral to count.
